nodes.title: Quickinsure
nodes.description: An insurance comparison service with an MIS built in Ruby on Rails. Worked as a full-stack developer in a team of 5 for over a year.

nodes.title: Apps at Media.net
nodes.description: Part of the front-end team building web apps having more than a million impressions a day.

nodes.title: Learnawesome
nodes.description: An open source platform for expolring the best learning resources for any topic. Built in Ruby on Rails, worked at the initial stages as a full-stack developer.

nodes.title: Personal blog
nodes.description: Personal portfolio and a place to publish blogs. Built in GatsbyJs, React. (This website!)

nodes.title: Calendars App
nodes.description: A Ruby on Rails app that syncs all your Google calendar events and presents them in a simple UI

nodes.title: Game of Shares
nodes.description: A share market simulator to learn the basics of share market built in PHP, MySQL. A hobby project built in college which went viral for a short period of time among 300+ students.

nodes.title: Days Until
nodes.description: A simple Chrome extension I built which gained 3000+ weekly active users organically and was featured on ProductHunt.

nodes.title: Bookshare
nodes.description: A web portal acting as a community for the book readers of the college WCE, Sangli built in PHP, MySQL, had 75+ active happy users when active.
